item.title: Navigating Extremes: Dynamic Sparsity in Large Output Spaces
item.description: SPARTEX achieves memory-efficient extreme multi-label classification by integrating dynamic sparse training with an auxiliary loss function, enabling end-to-end training with millions of labels on com…
